description: This file defines Pydantic models representing various data schemas for a FastAPI backend, including session creation, typing samples, submission requests, speed statistics, and session summaries. These models are used for request validation and response serialization in the API.

classes.name: SessionCreate
classes.description: Request model to create or get a typing session.

classes.name: TypingSample
classes.description: A typing sample captured over a short time interval.

classes.name: SubmissionRequest
classes.description: Request model for submitting multiple typing samples for a session.

classes.name: SpeedStat
classes.description: Computed speed statistics for a session.

classes.name: SessionSummary
classes.description: Aggregated summary of samples for a session.

methods.name: str session_id_not_empty(cls, v: str)
methods.description: Validator to ensure session_id is a non-empty string.

methods.name: List[TypingSample] samples_not_empty(cls, v: List[TypingSample])
methods.description: Validator to ensure the samples list is not empty.

ctags.name: SessionCreate
ctags.pattern: /^class SessionCreate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: SessionSummary
ctags.pattern: /^class SessionSummary(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: SpeedStat
ctags.pattern: /^class SpeedStat(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: SubmissionRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class SubmissionRequest(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TypingSample
ctags.pattern: /^class TypingSample(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: accuracy
ctags.pattern: /^    accuracy: Optional[float] = Field($/

ctags.name: avg_wpm
ctags.pattern: /^    avg_wpm: float = Field(..., ge=0, description="Average words per minute (>= 0).")$/

ctags.name: chars_typed
ctags.pattern: /^    chars_typed: int = Field(..., ge=0, description="Number of characters typed (>= 0).")$/

ctags.name: duration_ms
ctags.pattern: /^    duration_ms: int = Field(..., ge=0, description="Duration in milliseconds (>= 0).")$/

ctags.name: last_updated
ctags.pattern: /^    last_updated: datetime = Field(..., description="Last update timestamp.")$/

ctags.name: last_updated
ctags.pattern: /^    last_updated: datetime = Field(..., description="Last update timestamp.")$/

ctags.name: samples
ctags.pattern: /^    samples: List[TypingSample] = Field(..., description="List of typing samples (must be non-em/

ctags.name: samples_count
ctags.pattern: /^    samples_count: int = Field(..., ge=0, description="Number of samples aggregated (>= 0).")$/

ctags.name: samples_not_empty
ctags.pattern: /^    def samples_not_empty(cls, v: List[TypingSample]) -> List[TypingSample]:$/

ctags.name: session_id
ctags.pattern: /^    session_id: Optional[str] = Field($/

ctags.name: session_id
ctags.pattern: /^    session_id: str = Field(..., description="Session identifier to associate the sample with.")$/

ctags.name: session_id
ctags.pattern: /^    session_id: str = Field(..., description="Session identifier.")$/

ctags.name: session_id
ctags.pattern: /^    session_id: str = Field(..., description="Session identifier.")$/

ctags.name: session_id
ctags.pattern: /^    session_id: str = Field(..., description="Target session id for the submission.")$/

ctags.name: session_id_not_empty
ctags.pattern: /^    def session_id_not_empty(cls, v: str) -> str:$/

ctags.name: timestamp
ctags.pattern: /^    timestamp: datetime = Field(..., description="Timestamp when the sample was recorded.")$/

ctags.name: total_chars
ctags.pattern: /^    total_chars: int = Field(..., ge=0, description="Total characters typed (>= 0).")$/

ctags.name: total_duration_ms
ctags.pattern: /^    total_duration_ms: int = Field(..., ge=0, description="Total duration in ms (>= 0).")$/

ctags.name: user_id
ctags.pattern: /^    user_id: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Optional user identifier.")$/

ctags.name: wpm
ctags.pattern: /^    wpm: float = Field(..., description="Computed words per minute.")$/
